DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm , multicenter Phase 2 study determine efficacy safety JCAR015 adult patient relapse refractory B-ALL . The study follow sequential phase : Part A ( screen , leukapheresis , cell product preparation , cytoreductive chemotherapy ) Part B ( treatment follow-up ) . The follow-up period participant approximately 12 month final JCAR015 infusion . The total duration study expect approximately 3 year . Long-term follow-up survival , toxicity , viral vector safety continue separate long-term follow-up protocol per health regulatory authority guideline , currently 15 year last JCAR015 infusion .
